text: I welcome the President and working with him to try to get some of that medical malpractice reform so we can get the cost of health care to come down.
author: Ben Quayle

text: Fort Smith, being the place of my longest stay, was the scene of my largest medical practice.
author: Ernest Thompson Seton

text: Radio interoperability is essential for our police, fire, and emergency medical service departments to communicate with each other in times of emergency.
author: Lucille Roybal-Allard

text: Understand that legal and illegal are political, and often arbitrary, categorizations use and abuse are medical, or clinical, distinctions.
author: Abbie Hoffman

text: My diminished girth, in tailor phraseology, was hardly conceivable even by my own friends, or my respected medical adviser, until I put on my former clothing, over what I now wear, which is a thoroughly convincing proof of the remarkable change.
author: William Banting
